connectivity.searchForCozmoFailedText.translation: You need to connect to Cozmo

connectivity.updatingFirmwareSubTitle.translation: Please keep Cozmo on his charger

connectivity.updatingFirmwareFooter.translation: You will need to reconnect to Cozmo's WiFi after the update completes

connectivity.pairingPinTitle.translation: Enter the pin shown on your Cozmo

connectivity.updateApp.translation: You must update your Cozmo App to continue

connectivity.pullTabsTitle.translation: Pull the tabs on your Power Cubes

connectivity.pairingDesc.translation: This step is required when connecting from a new device

connectivity.cozmoSleepDesc.translation: Cozmo is going to sleep and will disconnect soon

connectivity.cozmoLowBatteryDesc.translation: Please place Cozmo on his charger

connectivity.keepCozmoOnCharger.translation: Please leave Cozmo on his charger during Setup

connectivity.replaceCozmoOnCharger.translation: Remove and replace Cozmo on his charger

connectivity.connectionRejected.title.translation:
Another Device is connected to Cozmo
Please disconnect that Device and try again

needs.unconnected.needToConnect.descript.translation: In order to care for Cozmo and check on his needs, you must first connect to him.
